DOC.brief_summary: The aim study 1 ) delineate molecular mechanism behind large variation insulin sensitivity among apparently healthy subject 2 ) establish dose-response relationship physical training ) metabolic health , b ) appetite c ) cultural health .
DOC.criteria: Healthy accord interview Caucasian Sedentary , Vo2max < 45 ml/kg/min BMI 2530 kg/m2 Fat percentage 25 % < Weight stable ( +/ 2 kg within past 6 month ) First degree relative type 2 diabetes Hemoglobin concentration < 8 mmol/l Fasting plasma glucose 6.1 mmol/l < Blood pressure 140/90 mmHg < Regular intake medicine
